properties.description: it will bring the master Data from the one profile

source.sqlReaderQuery:
SELECT 	a.AttributeValueDDObjectID as ID, -- Updated from a.AttributeValueDDObjectID as ID,
		ltrim(rtrim(a.AttributeValueName)) as [NAME] ,
		ltrim(rtrim(c.DataDictionaryObjectShortDesc)) as [Description] ,
		ltrim(rtrim(g.AttributeValueName)) as [UtilizationEligibleIndicator] ,
		ltrim(rtrim(e.AttributeValueName)) as [CustomerFacingIndicator] ,
		ltrim(rtrim(d.AttributeValueName)) as [BillableIndicator] ,
		ltrim(rtrim(f.AttributeValueName)) as [CategoryGroup] ,
		a.BusinessEffectiveStartDate [EffectiveStartDate], -- Updated from a.AttributeValueEffectiveDate [EffectiveStartDate] ,
		a.BusinessEffectiveEndDate [EffectiveEndDate]-- Updated from c.DataDictionaryObExpirationDate [EffectiveEndDate]
FROM    dbo.TAXY01AttributeValue a -- Updated from dbo.TAXY01AttributeValue a
		JOIN dbo.TAXY01Attribute b ON b.AttributeDataDictionaryObjID = a.OwningAttributeDDObjectID
		JOIN dbo.TAXY01DataDictionaryObject c ON c.DataDictionaryObjectID = a.AttributeValueDDObjectID -- Updated from a.AttributeValueDDObjectID
		
		LEFT JOIN ( SELECT  a.AttributeValueName ,
							c.ChildAttributeValueDDObjID
					FROM    dbo.TAXY01AttributeValue a
							JOIN dbo.TAXY01Attribute b ON b.AttributeDataDictionaryObjID = a.OwningAttributeDDObjectID
							JOIN dbo.TAXY01AttributeValueRltn c ON c.ParentAttributeValueDDObjID = a.AttributeValueDDObjectID
					WHERE   b.AttributeName = 'Labor Category Billable Indicator'
					) d ON d.ChildAttributeValueDDObjID = a.AttributeValueDDObjectID -- Updated from a.AttributeValueDDObjectID
		
		LEFT JOIN ( SELECT  a.AttributeValueName ,
							c.ChildAttributeValueDDObjID
					FROM    dbo.TAXY01AttributeValue a
							JOIN dbo.TAXY01Attribute b ON b.AttributeDataDictionaryObjID = a.OwningAttributeDDObjectID
							JOIN dbo.TAXY01AttributeValueRltn c ON c.ParentAttributeValueDDObjID = a.AttributeValueDDObjectID
					WHERE   b.AttributeName = 'Labor Category Task Related Indicator'
					) e ON e.ChildAttributeValueDDObjID = a.AttributeValueDDObjectID -- Updated from a.AttributeValueDDObjectID
		LEFT JOIN ( SELECT  a.AttributeValueName ,
							c.ChildAttributeValueDDObjID
					FROM    dbo.TAXY01AttributeValue a
							JOIN dbo.TAXY01Attribute b ON b.AttributeDataDictionaryObjID = a.OwningAttributeDDObjectID
							JOIN dbo.TAXY01AttributeValueRltn c ON c.ParentAttributeValueDDObjID = a.AttributeValueDDObjectID
					WHERE   b.AttributeName = 'Labor Category Group Name'
					) f ON f.ChildAttributeValueDDObjID = a.AttributeValueDDObjectID -- Updated from a.AttributeValueDDObjectID
		
		LEFT JOIN ( SELECT  a.AttributeValueName ,
							c.ChildAttributeValueDDObjID
					FROM    dbo.TAXY01AttributeValue a
							JOIN dbo.TAXY01Attribute b ON b.AttributeDataDictionaryObjID = a.OwningAttributeDDObjectID
							JOIN dbo.TAXY01AttributeValueRltn c ON c.ParentAttributeValueDDObjID = a.AttributeValueDDObjectID
					WHERE   b.AttributeName = 'Labor Category Utilization Eligible Indicator'
					) g ON g.ChildAttributeValueDDObjID = a.AttributeValueDDObjectID -- Updated from a.AttributeValueDDObjectID
		
WHERE   AttributeName = 'Labor Category Name'
